embeds.title: Online Multiplayer using Steamworks Fix
embeds.description:
Online Multiplayer using Steamworks Fix
✧ Download & install the game from [FitGirl](https://fitgirl-repacks.site/nioh-2-the-complete-edition/)'s website.
✧ Copy the contents of (Nioh 2 - Complete Edition \ NoDVD \ Steamworks Fix) archive to your game folder.
✧ Launch Steam and log in.
✧ Run nioh2.exe to play.
✧ To create an online session find the STARTING POINT on the mission map screen and select the Torri Gate.

fields.name: How to Update ¨V1.25.00 to 1.28.00¨
fields.value:
✧ Download an update.
✧ Extract the archive and Copy the contents of the Update folder to the game folder.
✧ Run Nioh_2_Complete_Edition_Update_v1.26.00.bat.
✧ Copy the content from the Crack folder to the Game Folder.
(The Online Fix still works with the 1.25.01 update, just copy the contents of the (Nioh 2 - Complete Edition \ NoDVD \ Steamworks Fix) archive back to the game folder.)
✧ For update 1.26.00+ use the [1.26 Steamfix](https://pixeldrain.com/u/3k5MjKBc) instead.
